title: The blessed peace-maker and Christian reconciler: intended for the healing of all unatural and unchristian divisions, in all relations: according to the purport of that divine oracle, pronounced by the Prince of Peace himself, Matth. 5.9. By Claudius Gilbert, B.D. minister of the Gospel at Limrick.
author: Gilbert, Claudius, d. 1696?
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Francis Titon, and are to be sold at the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street,
